mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, SYSDATE, NULL, 'Y' )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MEMBER SET
USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_NICKNAME =#{userNickname}, PHONE = #{phone}, ZIPCODE = #{zipcode}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, ADDRESS3 = #{address3}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT B.POST_NO, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.CREATE_DATE, P.MODIFY_DATE, B.USER_NO, B.BOARD_NO, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO, SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO, IA.CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN IMG_ATTACHMENT IA ON B.BOARD_NO = IA.REF_BNO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND IA.IMG_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.POST_NO DESC

SELECT M.USER_EMAIL, C.COMMENT_NO, C.BOARD_NO, C.USER_NO, C.CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.MODIFY_DATE, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO, SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO, P.POST_NO FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO=P.POST_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.COMMENT_NO DESC
